original_title: Bottom of the 9th: Little Big League 3
overview: The sex-crazed ballplayers from Little Big League and 2nd Inning: Little Big League II are back and ready to take another one for the team in Doug Jeffries' steamy sex comedy Bottom of the 9th: Little Big League III. This next installment is the hottest one yet.
title: Bottom of the 9th: Little Big League 3
